scripts.build: lerna run build --scope '@bugsnag/node' --scope '@bugsnag/browser' --scope '@bugsnag/expo' && lerna run build --ignore '@bugsnag/node' --ignore '@bugsnag/browser' --ignore '@bugsnag/expo'
scripts.test:build-browser-container: docker-compose up --build minimal-packager && docker-compose build --pull browser-maze-runner
scripts.test:build-node-container: docker-compose up --build minimal-packager && docker-compose build --pull node-maze-runner
scripts.test:browser: npm run test:build-browser-container && docker-compose run --use-aliases browser-maze-runner
scripts.test:node: npm run test:build-node-container && docker-compose run --use-aliases node-maze-runner
scripts.test:expo:android: npm run test:build-expo-android-container && APP_LOCATION=build/output.apk docker-compose run --use-aliases expo-maze-runner
scripts.test:expo:ios: npm run test:build-expo-ios-container && APP_LOCATION=build/output.ipa docker-compose run --use-aliases expo-maze-runner
